title: Lynda - HTML: Building Tables
description:
Lynda - HTML: Building Tables 

Subject:	Web 
Software:	HTML 
Author:	James Williamson 

1h 51m Beginner Mar 18, 2015 | Uploaded in Apr 19, 2015 by 2boweb

Tables are an important part of HTML and a foundational skill for any web designer. This course, taught by lynda.com senior staff author James Williamson, covers the main three skills you need to learn to display and format tabular data on the web. Watch and learn how to build tables with HTML, style tables with CSS, and use best practices to make your table data more meaningful and accessible.
